instructions:
Instructions": "# EotE - Character Sheet v2.5
Required:
    •	Roll20 Mentor Subscription
    •   https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/master/StarWarsEdgeOfTheEmpire_Dice/EotE-Dice.js

v2.0 – Updates:
    •	Vehicle sheet
    •	Critical Vehicle table - Players can roll criticals from their character sheet and heal (remove criticals). The heal button does not make a Medical check and critical effects are not applied to rolls.
    •	PC/NPC initiative roll


v1.5 – Updates:
    •	Output skill name in chat
    •	Output character name in chat, so now if you are rolling as the GM from a NPC sheet it will use the character sheet name.
    •	Critical Injury table - Players can roll criticals from their character sheet and heal (remove criticals). The heal button does not make a Medical check and critical effects are not applied to rolls.
    •	Improved tab navigation system: Tabs: Character, Skills, Talents, Weapons & Gear
    •	Skills show which dice to roll.

v1.1 – Updates:
    •	Skill tooltips quick reference for skill description and success, advantage, triumph, threat and despair rolls.
    •	Custom dice input for skills and weapons. Now you can add boost die to your skill. example '1b' = 1 boos.  All the dice roll codes from before work (#b #g #y #w #blk #p #r ).
    •	Added Encumbrance Threshold and Current. It also adds 1 setback die per rank over characters threshold to you dice pool.
    •	Added checkbox click to view 'View Attachments' to weapons to hopefully save some space on the sheet.
    •	GM Dice Pool. The GM Dice Pool allows the GM to set the dice of the dice pool without the other players knowing what was entered. The results will still show for everyone in the chat but the players won't know before the roll what dice was added. 

v1.0 – Updates:
    •	Character sheet
    •	Basic dice rolls
    •	Tabs
